items.title: Remote Work from Home SQL DBA - W-2 Only
items.content:
W-2 ONLY. No Corp to Corp.

This role can work 100% remote from home telecommute (after first 2-3 weeks of training in the office, travel expensed).

Our client in the Philadelphia area is looking for a SQL DBA to join their team. This is an on-going need with a very well-known organization, starting as a 6+ month contract with high likelihood of extension and eventual conversion to a permanent position is possible.

Position Description:

Maintain SQL and Oracle databases

Work with Postgres, Mongo, and AWS

  • Understand how databases work differently on AWS

  • Perform some AWS administration

  • Work with RDS (Relational Database Services)

Work alongside other DBAs (1 who has a lot of Oracle experience) to keep the environment running

Required Skills:

  • Both SQL and Oracle DBA experience a must - majority of work is SQL and Postgres - Oracle is secondary

  • Experience working closely with a software development team where software is the product

  • AWS cloud experience a must

  • Postgres a must

Find Us on Facebook!

Follow Us on Twitter!

Beacon Hill is an Equal Opportunity Employer that values the strength diversity brings to the workplace. Individuals with Disabilities and Protected Veterans are encouraged to apply.

Company Profile:

Beacon Hill Technologies, a premier National Information Technology Staffing Group, provides world class technology talent across all industries on a contract, direct (permanent), contract-to-direct and project basis. Beacon Hill Technologies' dedicated team of recruiting and staffing experts consistently delivers quality IT professionals to solve our customers' technical and business needs.

Beacon Hill Technologies covers a broad spectrum of IT positions, including Project Management and Business Analysis, Programming/Development, Database, Infrastructure, Quality Assurance, Production/Support and ERP roles.

Learn more about Beacon Hill Staffing Group and our specialty divisions, Beacon Hill Technologies, Beacon Hill Associates, Beacon Hill Financial, Beacon Hill Legal, and Beacon Hill HR by visiting .

We look forward to working with you.

Beacon Hill. Employing the Future™ - provided by Dice Remote Work from Home SQL DBA - W-2 Only

REMOTE Sr. Database Developer- Ruby, AWS, MySQL and Aurora REQUIRED

About this job

Job type: Full-time
Experience level: Senior, Lead
Role: Database Administrator
Industry: Software Development
Company size: 201-500 people
Company type: Private
Company: Surge | No office location

Technologies

ruby
database-administration
amazon-web-services
aurora
mysql

Job description

SURGE is looking for smart, self-motivated, experienced, senior-level software engineers who enjoy the freedom of telecommuting and flexible schedules, to work as long-term, consistent (40 hrs/week) independent contractors (no W2) on a variety of software development projects.

Skills & Requirements

Database Developer (Lead) - Ruby architect who has distributed large scale DBA in cloud-like environments, strong AWS experience, Aurora (strong), MySQL (moderate)

Must be located in the US or Canada to be considered for this role. Sorry, No Visas.

For immediate consideration, email resume with home location, email address and cell phone number. Must include tech stack under each job.

Apply now

About Surge

Surge is a leading provider of custom web, cloud, mobile, and desktop software development and consulting services to clients in every major industry, from hot startups to Fortune 500 companies. Founded in 2007, we have successfully delivered hundreds of software products and solutions to our clients using only the top 1% of US and Canada based software designers, developers, project managers, and testers. Simply put, we offer America's best software engineers on demand at 30-50% less than the competition.

Benefits

  • Great Pay
  • Choose Your Hours
  • Work From Home
  • Work With Happy People
  • Zero Commute
  • See Your Family More
  • Travel While You Work
  • Software Provided

items.title: Sr. Full Stack Developer (C#/ React/SQL Server/Azure) at AssureSign (Atlanta, GA)
tags: DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=0, other=0, dotnet=82, c=12, mobile=4, go=0, nodejs=10, bigdata-ml=0, ruby=0, apple=2, java=1, gamedev=0, php=0, embedded=0, frontend=66}
items.content:
Sr. Full Stack Developer (C#/ React/SQL Server/Azure)

About this job

Job type: Full-time
Experience level: Mid-Level, Senior
Role: Full Stack Developer
Industry: Software Development / Engineering
Company size: 11-50 people
Company: AssureSign | Atlanta, GA

Remote details

Office Location: Atlanta, GA. Employees can also work full time from this office.

Technologies

c#
javascript
azure
react
typescript

Job description

Javascript/C# Software Developer

Job Description

Growing software company looking for a self-starting, experienced, and versatile software developer based in Atlanta, GA or remote.

This team meets (virtually) and is responsible for rolling out regular releases to several web, mobile, and desktop applications.  At a high level, this developer will be responsible for:

  • designing and implementing new features and functionality for both new and existing web, mobile, and desktop applications
  • conducting R&D with new libraries, frameworks, and technologies
  • reviewing code and mentoring junior level developers
  • fixing bugs (nobody likes it, but we’ve all got to do it)
  • contributing to product documentation
  • responding to more technical questions from customers than we care about
  • communicating openly and effectively with co-workers and customers

We utilize agile methodologies and typically follow a 2-week release cadence. In addition to our daily scrum meetings via Skype, we also meet weekly (virtually) to share our progress with the entire time. Once or twice a year we meet for in-person for meetings/ training.

We make heavy use of Visual Studio Online for backlog and issue tracking. We love Open Source, but we don’t shy away from spending money to make sure we have the right tools for the job.  We aren’t afraid of trying new technology and make a point of regularly evaluating new tooling, libraries, and frameworks. 

Work schedules are flexible, but reasonable availability for meetings, collaboration, and customer support during core business hours is required.

Skills & Requirements

Our ideal candidate will exhibit:

  • proven experience developing large, rich JavaScript applications
  • demonstrable skills working with responsive design, HTML 5, and CSS
  • a solid command and understanding of C# and ASP.NET
  • the ability to work easily in a variety of programming languages and environments to support a variety of web, mobile, and desktop applications
  • an approach of always writing code as if they are the ones that will have to maintain it over the long haul (because who knows, maybe they will be…)
  • a serious interest in learning about and trying out new technologies and platforms

In addition, the following would be beneficial:

  • a working knowledge of SQL (ideally SQL Server)
  • experience developing JavaScript applications using TypeScript
  • experience working with cloud services, SQL Database, and BLOB storage in Microsoft Azure
  • professional-level written and verbal communications skills

If you have the experience and skills listed, we’d love to hear from you.

NO recruiters please.

About Us

AssureSign has been providing mission-critical electronic signature solutions to enterprise customers since 1999.  With over 400 million global signature events to-date, AssureSign is a clear leader in the market in both cloud and on-premise deployments.

We are headquartered in Atlanta, GA and are fortunate to call the Atlanta Tech Village our home.  We work in a mixed physical/virtual environment with some employees based out of our Atlanta office and others working from home.  We’ve worked hard over the past couple of years to completely virtualize our network and server infrastructure.  All of those services now reside in the Microsoft Azure cloud.

Our Technology Stack

Web Applications

On the server-side, our web applications typically leverage ASP.NET (C#) and SQL Server (typically Azure SQL Database).  With a service oriented architectural style, we rely on Nancy FX to develop our light-weight .NET-based HTTP services.

On the client-side, we make heavy use of JavaScript to create rich client-side experiences.  Most of our code is written in TypeScript using React and Redux.  We typically utilize a Gulp-based build system to generate our client-side code (CSS, JavaScript) from our source TypeScript and LESS files and to maximize our control over the build process.

Mobile Applications

We currently offer native mobile applications that work with our core SaaS product and specifically target: iOS, Android, and the Universal Windows Platform (UWP).

Desktop Applications

Our .NET based Windows desktop applications are designed to complement our core SaaS web application and make heavy use of the web-based API for our core application.

Why Work at AssureSign?

Our product: We’re customer centric and committed to continuous improvements to stand out from the competition.  The backlog never gets smaller, but the product continues to evolve and improve.

Our Team: We’re team players - We’re committed to the growth of our company and product and are supportive of one another.  We’re looking for a motivated developer to join us who thrives in a fast pace environment. 

We’re passionate about what we do, and have an ‘all hands on deck’ mentality when it comes to the success of our company and product.  We adapt, we find solutions, and are willing to question assumptions and think outside the box. We are looking for someone who shares those characteristics and is truly passionate about coding.

Benefits

In addition to competitive pay, AssureSign offers the following benefits:

  • Medical
  • Dental
  • Vision
  • Supplemental Insurance
  • 401k with company match and immediate full vesting
  • And an open vacation/time off policy: yes, you read that correctly
Apply now

About AssureSign

AssureSign has been providing mission-critical electronic signature solutions to enterprise customers since 1999.  With over 180 million global signature events to-date, AssureSign is a clear leader in the market in both cloud and on-premise deployments.

We are headquartered in Atlanta, GA and are fortunate to call the Atlanta Tech Village our home.  We work in a mixed physical/virtual environment with some employees based out of our Atlanta office and others working from home.  We’ve worked hard over the past couple of years to completely virtualize our network and server infrastructure.  All of those services now reside in the Microsoft Azure cloud.

Benefits

  • Medical
  • Dental
  • Vision
  • Supplemental Insurance
  • 401k with matching and full vesting
  • Open vacation/time off policy

items.title: PostgreSQL Database Engineer
tags: DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=2, other=0, dotnet=0, c=0, mobile=0, go=0, nodejs=0, bigdata-ml=8, ruby=0, apple=0, java=0, gamedev=0, php=0, embedded=0, frontend=0}
items.content:
PostgreSQL Database Engineer

Headquarters: Spain/UK
URL: https://careers.ebury.com/ebury-teams/technology/

If you are a database engineer, with at least five years of experience and you are looking for to develop your career in an international environment, please read on!

In Ebury you can provide your talent and experience to our team at the same time you inspire your professional career.

Our global development and technical support is headquartered in Málaga, our technological hub, with growing teams in Madrid and London. We provide our services across world-wide financial markets, and we are expanding our DevOps team to be distributed globally.

RESPONSIBILITIES
  • Design and give support to our company database
  • Deploy and manage solutions of database active monitoring
  • Design the data distribution and the storage solutions
  • Analyze and report company data which could help to take decisions about business intelligence
  • Analyze data combinations to perfect performance
  • Design solutions for distributed database

REQUIREMENTS
  • Deep knowledge about PostgreSQL and no SQL database (Redis y MongoDB)
  • Experience in dba in cloud (AWS RDS)
  • Administration of Linux servers
  • Knowledge of Python and frameworks with ORM
  • Experience in AWS (Cloud Computing)

VALUABLE EXTRA SKILLS
  • MySQL and AWS Redshift knowledge
  • Experience with Continuous Delivery and Continuous Integration
  • Knowledge of Elasticsearch
  • Good English level

WHO WE ARE LOOKING FOR?
  • A person with attention to details, motivation and willingness to learn
  • With evident passion in technology
  • With analytic capacities and initiative to propose new ideas, solutions and tools
  • A team player ready to face all the challenges with the team

WHY WORKING WITH US?
  • Great opportunity for a professional career in a company with a development over 100% in the last five years and in a continuing innovative environment
  • To participate in one of the most disruptive technological sector
  • We offer competitive conditions as well as the possibility to keep growing thanks to continuous reviews and career plan

To apply: Send a resume to recruitment.malaga@ebury.com

items.title: SQL Data Specialist
tags: DBG:surround``3N( OR(feasibl,OR(consid,consider),option,occas,opportun,possibl,abil), OR(3N(remot, work),telecommut,2N(work,home)) ) NOT OR(regularli, abracadabra)
items.content:
SQL Data Specialist at Fundriver

Remote

Fundriver, a fast paced, entrepreneurial technology solutions company, is looking for a full-time SQL Data Specialist. Looking for candidates who thrive in a collaborative virtual environment working from home. As a small, growing company, Fundriver employees participate in decisions about how the business operates and contribute directly to Fundriver’s growth.

Job Purpose:

The role of the SQL Data Specialist is to work collaboratively within the Client Services model to help maintain and service the growing client base. The SQL Data Specialist must be able to work well within a team.

Main Responsibilities:

This position will require the SQL Data Specialist to write and modify queries, scripts, stored procedures for completing the following:

  • Deliver high-level support to client and Client Experience team by fielding tickets, meeting deadlines, prioritizing work items, and communicating work flow
  • Build, maintain, test, and deploy client imports and exports Design, develop, and test SQL objects that drive custom and standard reports
  • Collaborate with Project and Report Specialist to ensure client expectations are met
  • Support internal Client Experience projects (documenting client-specific processes and providing internal training)
  • Support internal Development projects, such as table and stored procedure cleanup, mass updates, audits, testing, and new feature deployment
  • The SQL Data Specialist will be directly working with the Implementation team and the Project and Report Specialist to handle new and existing client imports, exports and reports. In addition, the SQL Data Specialist will document client specific processes with the help of the Client Relationship Specialist.

Qualified candidate requirements include:

  • Bachelor’s degree preferred
  • 1-3 years of T-SQL experience (e.g. creating queries, stored procedures, views)
  • Proficiency with Microsoft Office products
  • Some accounting experience, audit, and financial reporting standards, a plus
  • Experience with Blackbaud, Ellucian or Workday, a plus
  • Strong communication and teamwork skills with an open, friendly demeanor
  • Strong time management, prioritization, multitasking and organizational skills Experience working independently, excellent critical thinking and troubleshooting skills Dedication to excellence in customer service
  • Ability to work from home full time – can be located anywhere in the US

To learn more about Fundriver, please visit our website, http://fundriver.com.

Apply for job

items.title: Full-Stack ASP.NET MVC, C#, VB, SQL Server Engineer (Senior, Remote) at TopDevz (Sacramento, CA)
tags: DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=0, other=0, dotnet=134, c=10, mobile=0, go=0, nodejs=2, bigdata-ml=0, ruby=0, apple=0, java=0, gamedev=0, php=0, embedded=0, frontend=26}
items.content:
Full-Stack ASP.NET MVC, C#, VB, SQL Server Engineer (Senior, Remote)

About this job

Job type: Full-time
Experience level: Senior
Role: Full Stack Developer
Industry: Agile Software Development
Company size: 11-50 people
Company type: Private
Company: TopDevz | Sacramento, CA

Remote details

Office Location: Sacramento, CA. Employees can also work full time from this office.

Technologies

asp.net
asp.net-mvc
c#
sql-server
vb.net

Job description

We are looking for an experienced, senior, full-stack ASP.NET, C#, SQL Server engineer, who is excited to work on one of our many client projects - both greenfield (new) projects as well as legacy (support) projects in that technology stack. This is a remote position.

Skills & Requirements

The following skills are required:

  1. Very experienced (5+ Years) in Full-Stack Development: Front-end and Back-end
  2. Very experienced (5+ Years) in ASP.NET MVC
  3. Very experienced (5+ Years) in C#
  4. Very experienced (5+ Years) in Microsoft SQL Server
  5. Experience with VB
  6. Experience with Entity Framework
  7. Experience with JavaScript and typical JS Frameworks (i.e. Angular, Knockout etc.)
  8. Experience with Bootstrap
  9. Knowledge of a typical development lifecycle (development to deployment) using typical industry tools, e.g. Atlassian JIRA and BitBucket
  10. Good written and verbal communication skills
  11. Significant attention to detail when writing code, including good commenting and code documentation skills
  12. Not required, but a big Plus: Experience with other SQL RDBMS (e.g. Postgres)
Apply now

About TopDevz

TopDevz is a boutique software development consulting agency. We place major focus on not just delivering excellent value and top-notch software to our clients, but also the happiness of our team. We are providing a friendly, remote work environment as well as a suite of interesting and challenging projects to work on.

Benefits

  • Incredible Colleagues
  • Competitive Compensation
  • Friendly Work Environment
  • Interesting and Challenging Projects

items.title: Oracle Cloud Developer at Accenture India (Gurugram, India)
items.content:
Oracle Cloud Developer

About this job

Job type: Full-time
Experience level: Junior, Mid-Level, Senior
Role: Full Stack Developer
Industry: Technical Services
Company size: 10k+ people
Company type: Private
Company: Accenture India | Gurugram, India

Remote details

Office Location: Gurugram, India. Employees can also work full time from this office.
Relocation Assistance: Yes

Technologies

oracle
cloud

Job description

We are looking for professionals (with 4 - 10 years  of experience) who can fulfill the following criteria:

Role : Cloud Technical Architecture Delivery  

Location : Delhi/ NCR

Role Description : Accountable for the technical aspects of solution delivery and implementation through to successful live operations. Ensures the realisation of the solution architecture, making sure it is operable & cost-effective. Implement scalable, high performance hosting solutions that meet the need of todays corporate and digital applications using both private and public cloud technologies. Deliver legacy infrastructure transformation and migration to drive next-generation business outcomes.

Must have Skills : 

  • Oracle Cloud
  • 6 years of experience as cloud technical architect including: Deep knowledge in Public vs Private vs Hybrid Solution Development  
  • Working knowledge of Oracle Public Cloud IaaS/PaaS 
  • Working knowledge of Data Management on Cloud  
  • Cloud security solution development experience  
  • Network solution development experience  
  • Cloud migration methodologies and processes, including tools used  
  • Knowledge in DevOps and As-a-Service methodologies

Good to Have Skills : Oracle Database Operations, Delivery Leadership, Cloud Infrastructure     

Job Requirements : Key Responsibilities :-

  • Oracle Cloud Technical Architect IaaS/PaaS across multi domain and technologies tower  including HA and DR topics
  • Network and Security Act as subject matter expert to drive the transformation to the Oracle Cloud IaaS/PaaS
  • Oracle Cloud architecture  Public/Private/Hybrid Cloud based solutions - to support specific requirements and be a part of the end-to-end solution development team 
  • Understands how to integrate and design Oracle Public Cloud services IaaS/PaaS into the overall solution framework 

If you, or a friend, match these requirements, please send in your resumes to Himani.a.gupta@accenture.com, marking “Oracle Cloud Stack Overflow” in the subject line.

Accenture is an equal opportunities employer and welcomes applications from all sections of society and does not discriminate on grounds of race, religion or belief, ethnic or national origin, disability, age, citizenship, marital, domestic or civil partnership status, sexual orientation, gender identity, or any other basis as protected by applicable law.

Apply now

About Accenture India

Accenture solves our clients' toughest challenges by providing unmatched services in Strategy, Consulting, Digital, Technology and Operations. We partner with more than three-quarters of the Fortune Global 500, driving innovation to improve the way the world works and lives. With expertise across more than 40 industries and all business functions, we deliver transformational outcomes for a demanding new digital world.

Benefits

  • Flexible Working Hours
  • Company Leased Vehicle
  • Health Insurance
  • Maternity, Paternity and Adoption Leave
  • Performance Bonus
  • Personal Development and Training
  • Fast Track Career Growth
  • Leadership Development Programs
  • Continuing Education Support
  • Team Outings & Annual Celebrations

items.title: Senior Media Server Engineer at Imajion Co
tags: DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=0, other=0, dotnet=0, c=16, mobile=0, go=0, nodejs=0, bigdata-ml=0, ruby=0, apple=0, java=0, gamedev=0, php=0, embedded=0, frontend=0}
items.content:
Senior Media Server Engineer

About this job

Job type: Full-time
Experience level: Mid-Level, Senior
Role: Backend Developer
Industry: Augmented Reality, Computer Software, Virtual Reality
Company size: 1-10 people
Company type: VC Funded
Company: Imajion Co | No office location

Technologies

webrtc
kurento
media
c++
compositing

Job description

Live anywhere, work remotely with Imajion to develop industry-leadingcommunications solutions for the Architecture, Engineering and Construction sector leveraging Mixed Reality technology such as the HoloLens. Come help us build the first digital teleportation tool for AEC and make your mark in the communications technology landscape with mixed reality. Travel to Barcelona, Los Angeles, Munich, or Zadar during our collaborative development retreats designed to help fuel inspiration, wonder and fun because we want your work to feel like play.


Responsibilities:

  • Integration, adaptation, and extension of Kurento Media Server capabilities to facilitate Mixed Reality usage scenarios.
  • Architecting Media Server back end services in support of high density client connections consisting of hundreds of simultaneous video/voice connections that will also carry composited Virtual 3D content.
  • Mentor and help us envision where the future of communications is headed, particularly with respect to MR and VR.


Requirements:

  • Familiarity with Kurento Media Server or similar Media Server implementations.
  • Deep understanding of video streaming and associated protocols such as WebRTC, RTSP, Video Over IP and like communications streaming systems
  • Experience with video compositing (2D a must, 3D a bonus)
  • Recent extensive C++ development experience used to adapt and extend Media Server solutions.
Apply now

Benefits

  • 401k
  • health insurance
  • work remotely
  • family time off

c#
javascript

react
typescript

About Us

AssureSign has been providing mission-critical electronic signature solutions to enterprise customers since 1999.  With over 400 million global signature events to-date, AssureSign is a clear leader in the market in both cloud and on-premise deployments.

We are headquartered in Atlanta, GA and are fortunate to call the Atlanta Tech Village our home.  We work in a mixed physical/virtual environment with some employees based out of our Atlanta office and others working from home.  We’ve worked hard over the past couple of years to completely virtualize our network and server infrastructure.  All of those services now reside in the Microsoft Azure cloud.

Our Technology Stack

Web Applications

On the server-side, our web applications typically leverage ASP.NET (C#) and SQL Server (typically Azure SQL Database).  With a service oriented architectural style, we rely on Nancy FX to develop our light-weight .NET-based HTTP services.

On the client-side, we make heavy use of JavaScript to create rich client-side experiences.  Most of our code is written in TypeScript using React and Redux.  We typically utilize a Gulp-based build system to generate our client-side code (CSS, JavaScript) from our source TypeScript and LESS files and to maximize our control over the build process.

Mobile Applications

We currently offer native mobile applications that work with our core SaaS product and specifically target: iOS, Android, and the Universal Windows Platform (UWP).

Desktop Applications

Our .NET based Windows desktop applications are designed to complement our core SaaS web application and make heavy use of the web-based API for our core application.

Why Work at AssureSign?

Our product: We’re customer centric and committed to continuous improvements to stand out from the competition.  The backlog never gets smaller, but the product continues to evolve and improve.

Our Team: We’re team players - We’re committed to the growth of our company and product and are supportive of one another.  We’re looking for a motivated developer to join us who thrives in a fast pace environment. 

We’re passionate about what we do, and have an ‘all hands on deck’ mentality when it comes to the success of our company and product.  We adapt, we find solutions, and are willing to question assumptions and think outside the box. We are looking for someone who shares those characteristics and is truly passionate about coding.

Benefits

In addition to competitive pay, AssureSign offers the following benefits:

  • Medical
  • Dental
  • Vision
  • Supplemental Insurance
  • 401k with company match and immediate full vesting
  • And an open vacation/time off policy: yes, you read that correctly
Apply now

About AssureSign

AssureSign has been providing mission-critical electronic signature solutions to enterprise customers since 1999.  With over 180 million global signature events to-date, AssureSign is a clear leader in the market in both cloud and on-premise deployments.

We are headquartered in Atlanta, GA and are fortunate to call the Atlanta Tech Village our home.  We work in a mixed physical/virtual environment with some employees based out of our Atlanta office and others working from home.  We’ve worked hard over the past couple of years to completely virtualize our network and server infrastructure.  All of those services now reside in the Microsoft Azure cloud.

Benefits

  • Medical
  • Dental
  • Vision
  • Supplemental Insurance
  • 401k with matching and full vesting
  • Open vacation/time off policy

items.title: Part-Time E-Commerce Admin Assistant
tags: DBG:surround``2N(work, remot) 2N OR(option, allow, abl, possibl, permit)

items.content:
Award-winning ski brand Faction is looking for a qualified admin assistant to join our E-commerce team

As part of a lean and fast-paced E-commerce and operations team, the individual will be immersed in the day to day management of our E-commerce ordering systems and will aid with stock control across all online platforms.

The role is to make sure all worldwide B2C orders placed through the Faction website, and various other platforms, are organised and logged correctly to enable our fans to get the products they need, as soon as they can. You will be managing the daily data entry related to these orders, verifying that all information is valid and correct, spotting any potential fraudulent orders and updating the stock as and when required.

The position is part-time (8:00-12:00) and running from Mid-September to Mid March. The applicant will be required to attend two weeks training at the Faction office in London, but will be able to work remotely once the initial training is complete (optional).

Due to the nature of the role you will be working very closely with our E-commerce, logistics and sales functions.

The person we are looking for has the following skills and competences:

Razor sharp attention to detail
Fluent in English
Structured, well organised and proactive working attitude, especially under pressure
Understanding of Excel and highly computer literate
Experience with use of an ERP system
Genuine passion for skiing

Please send your CV and coverletter to
